:v-model.description: The ID of the currently selected address

show-add-button.description: Whether or not to display the bottom button

right-icon.description: The icon name or image link on the right is equivalent to the [name attribute] of the Icon component(https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props)
right-icon.description_zh: 右侧图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

events.name: add
events.description: Triggered when the Add New button is clicked

events.name: edit
events.description: Triggered when the edit button is clicked

events.name: select
events.description: Triggered when the selected address is switched
events.params: 切换选中的地址时触发
events.description_zh: 切换选中的地址时触发

events.name: edit-disabled
events.description: Triggered when editing a non-deliverable address
events.params: 编辑不可配送的地址时触发
events.description_zh: 编辑不可配送的地址时触发

events.name: select-disabled
events.description: Triggered when an undeliverable address is selected
events.params: 选中不可配送的地址时触发
events.description_zh: 选中不可配送的地址时触发

events.name: click-item
events.description: Triggered when you click on any address
